title: Low Priority Queues
body: I joined league of legends today and I got put in a low priority queue. I never went AFK in the game and never left the game. So please help me with my problem

replies.body: While you might not have meant to leave any games, the system detected that you were AFK or inactive long enough for it to have flagged you. It looks like you only have two LPQ games left to play, so you'll be out of low priority before you know it.
